name: .WATCHFACE
summary: Learn about .WATCHFACE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a WATCHFACE file in the Apple Watch app for iOS devices. To do so, install the Apple Watch app, transfer the file to your iOS device, and then tap the file. Your file will then open in the Apple Watch app.
After you open a WATCHFACE file in the iOS Apple Watch app, the app will prompt you to add the file to your faces. Adding the file to your faces will make it available on your Apple Watch.
